title: How to dance like Lalisa Manoban - Quora

response.answer_text: I think you should take dance classes, and if that’s not affordable or if you have any other issues, you can just learn easy K-pop choreographies at home! Just go on youtube to find some dance covers/tutorials and try to memorize the choreographies. The key to become a good dancer is to work and train hard. Training hard to dance doesn’t mean that it’s mandatory to attend dance classes or to join a dance studio, just train hard at home .Lalisa Manoban has been a dancer for a long time means she practised and trained a lot. Even before coming to South Korea, she was part of a dance crew in Thailand. So, in conclusion, just practise a lot and I’m sure you’ll be able to dance like her some day. Anyway, Love ya, Baii~

watch her videos, get help from a dance coach. Spend a lot of time practicing and then you might be there. I would guarantee that you will be able to dance like her, because I do not know you, but I guess just go for it!
